Name: Fear Thy Neighbor
Title: Good Fences Make Dead Neighbors
Desc: A man finds himself embroiled in a feud with a neighbor that concludes with blasts from a shotgun.
LongDescription: When a man moves to Canyon Country, Calif., he finds himself embroiled in a bizarre and increasingly acrimonious 8-year feud with a neighbor that terminates with blasts from a shotgun.
